segments.text: Hi , I was wondering if you have my test results in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn â€™ t see anything out of the ordinary , but I want you to log onto our website for a printout of all of the details .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If there were any major problems , I would always notify you by phone to come in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will I learn when I see the results on the website ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A description of each test is given on the site .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will the numbers tell me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The website will give you a normal range and then tell you what your results are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are all of my test results on that site ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your entire test history is on the site . You can compare your results from other years .
segments.speaker: S2
